page.title: 02Folksworth
page.content: FOLKSWORTH In Folksworth there is a pub and a farm.The pub is called the Fox and there are houses. Most of them are detached houses.There are 2 big houses 1 is owned by Jed Ford and I don't know the other.There is a church at the end of the village.The farm is owned by Bob Castle and the shop is owned by Jack. There is a playing field and a pond that the ducks go in and sometimes a heron.There is a wood and a great big heap of mud called the mound. About 1 mile away there is a round_a_bout called Norman Cross and thats where there used to be a prison camp.
